alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 6:27PM EDT until May 22 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN NEW CASTLE COUNTY... At 626 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Kensington to South Philadelphia to Stanton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Newark, Elsmere, New Castle, Newport, Arden, Greenville, Stanton, North Star, Glasgow, Bear, Talleyville, Wilmington Manor, Pike Creek, Hockessin, Ashland, Bellefonte, Ardentown, Ardencroft and Edgemoor. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 1 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
